name: py-hydra-core

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A framework for elegantly configuring complex applications.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The IcedTea project provides a harness to build the source code from
https://openjdk.java.net/ using Free Software build tools and adds a
number of key features to the upstream OpenJDK codebase. IcedTea
requires an existing IcedTea or OpenJDK install to build.

dependencies.name: py-antlr4-python3-runtime
dependencies.description:
This package provides runtime libraries required to use parsers
generated for the Python3 language by version 4 of ANTLR (ANother Tool
for Language Recognition).

dependencies.name: py-omegaconf
dependencies.description:
A hierarchical configuration system, with support for merging
configurations from multiple sources (YAML config files,
dataclasses/objects and CLI arguments) providing a consistent API
regardless of how the configuration was created.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-lightly
dependent_to.description: A deep learning package for self-supervised learning.
